subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kris Joseph had a career-high 25 points, as No. 5 Syracuse improved to 13-0 with a 93-65 victory at home over Drexel on Wednesday night.
snippet: Kris Joseph had a career-high 25 points, as No. 5 Syracuse improved to 13-0 with a 93-65 victory at home over Drexel on Wednesday night.
